Body:
with expected_protocol(ik.tektronix.TekTDS224, ['DAT:SOU?', 'DAT:SOU CH2',
    'DAT:ENC RIB', 'DATA:WIDTH?', 'CURVE?', 'WFMP:CH2:YOF?',
    'WFMP:CH2:YMU?', 'WFMP:CH2:YZE?', 'WFMP:XZE?', 'WFMP:XIN?',
    'WFMP:CH2:NR_P?', 'DAT:SOU CH1'], ['CH1', '2', '#210' + bytes.fromhex(
    '00000001000200030004').decode('utf-8') + '0', '1', '0', '0', '1', '5']
    ) as tek:
    data = np.array([0, 1, 2, 3, 4])
    x, y = tek.channel[1].read_waveform()
    assert (x == data).all()
    assert (y == data).all()
